reviews.review_text:
Friends Bar and Restaurant offers a decent dining experience with food that's satisfactory but not extraordinary. While the menu has a variety of options, some dishes fall short in terms of flavor and presentation.

What truly stands out here is the incredible staff. The team is exceptionally friendly, attentive, and always eager to make your visit comfortable. Their warm hospitality and excellent service create a welcoming atmosphere that makes you want to return.

If you’re in Candolim and value great service, Friends Bar and Restaurant is worth a visit. The staff's dedication ensures a pleasant experience, even if the food isn’t the highlight.
The taste was great but the quantity was far from enough and dal was very less as u can c from the video
After 10 days of Indian veggie I needed a pit stop. Traditional English needed. Pies looked ace but had liver and bacon. Just like mum made. Staff professional and friendly.
